content: Write a paragraph about the ocean using only words that start with 's'.

Sure! So, the serene sea stretches silently, showcasing stunning shades of sapphire and sapphire. Schools of shimmering fish swim smoothly, sharing the space with sleek seals and soaring seagulls. Sunlight sparkles on the surface, casting spectacular shadows on the sandy seafloor. Ships sail slowly, their sails billowing in the soft sea breeze. Overall, the ocean is a soothing and spectacular sight to see.
